entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
